title: Landing in Pakistan, the Duchess of Cambridge shows the diplomatic style lessons she’s learnt from Princess Diana
text:
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge’s royal tour to Pakistan this week has been described as one of their most high stakes visits to date. Amidst complex security plans, the couple will be deploying their powers of soft diplomacy to strengthen ties with one of the world’s most strategically important regions.

Somewhere close to the top of the list in a charm offensive's perfect ingredients is fashion - by wearing styles and designers which are respectful of Pakistani symbols and traditions, the Duke and Duchess will flatter their hosts - and create dazzling, history-book-worthy photo opportunities.

Landing at Nur Khan Airbase in Islamabad on Monday evening, Kate suggested that she is taking the...
description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge’s royal tour to Pakistan this week has been described as one of their most high stakes visits to date.
